meanings.definition: A woman who possesses a million dollars or more in wealth.
meanings.sent1: The kind-hearted millionairess donated a large sum to the local charity.
meanings.sent2: The successful businesswoman became a millionairess after years of hard work.
meanings.sent3: The millionairess accidentally dropped her diamond necklace in the mud while gardening.
meanings.sent4: She was a millionairess in talent, able to play multiple musical instruments with ease.
meanings.sent5: The glamorous millionairess arrived at the gala in a stunning designer gown.
